name: Anti Eye Craft Plus
description:
Blast off on a new adventure!

Anti Eye Craft+ is a space shooting adventure game where you pilot the Loveship Hypernova through a perilous galaxy OR adventure as Sam and Emily to stop the evil Alba Troz!

Avoid meteors and blast  eyebats as you fight mini bosses in Classic Mode!

Can you save space from eyebat invasion?

Play as Sam and Emily as they help their friends complete quests in Story Mode!

Anti Eye Craft series © 2013-2018  Loveship Hypernova
